verses.1: A masa penin kong gen nop thu in: Mi khempeuh adingin Pasian tungah ngetna, thungetna, thumna le lungdamkohna na neih ding uh ahi hi.
verses.2: Eite nuam takin om thei-in, biakna lungsim nei-in a kilawm takin i nuntak theih nadingin kumpite le uliante adingin thu na ngetsak un.
verses.3: Hih bang gamtatnate pen eite hong Hon Pasian º muhna ah a hoih a kilawm thu ahi hi.
verses.4: Mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngahin, thuman a theihkim ding Pasian in deih hi.
verses.5: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian khat bek om a, Pasian le mite a hong kilemsakkik thei Khris Jesu khat bek om hi.
verses.6: Mi khempeuh a tan khia dingin tua Jesu hong kipiatawm a, a hun lian laitakin a hong kipiakna pen Pasian in mi khempeuh a hotkhiat nopna thu a kilatna ahi hi.
verses.7: Hih ka gen thu pen zuau ahi lo, thu taktak a gen ka hi a, Gentail mite lakah upna thu le hih thuman a gen dingin sawltak na semin thu a hilh dingin kei a hong kisawl ahi hi.
verses.8: Mun khempeuh ah a om pasal khempeuh in kuamah tawh kitotna le lungsim kinopmawhna nei het loin, lungsim siangtho tawh a khut uh lamin thu a nget ding uh ka deih hi.
verses.9: Tua mah bangin numeite zong a kilawm a kituak bekin kizemin kipuahin, sam khawng a uang lua-in bawl loin, a khengvalin kizepna a tuamtuamte zang loin,
verses.10: biakna lungsim neite adingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin gamtat hoih a neih ding uh ka deih hi.
verses.11: Numeite in gamdai takin kiniamkhiatna tawh thu ngai-in a sin ding uh ahi hi.
verses.12: Numeite in pasalte tungah aana nei-in thu a hilh ding ka phal kei hi. Gamdai takin a om ding uh ahi hi.
verses.13: Bang hang hiam cih leh a masa-in Adam kipiangsak a, tua ciangin Eve kipiangsak pan hi.
verses.14: Adam in khemna thuak masa lo a, numei in thuakin a khial masa a suak hi.
verses.15: Ahi zongin numei in a kilawm a kituakin upna, itna le sianthona thu ah kip takin a om nakleh nausuah gimna sihpih lo ding hi.
